SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package com.brickbreakergame.managers

Class GameBoardManager

java.lang.Object
com.brickbreakergame.managers.GameBoardManager
public class GameBoardManager extends Object
Manages the game board layout for different levels in the Brick Breaker game. This class is responsible for creating and arranging blocks in various patterns according to the level design. It also provides functionality to determine block types based on random generation, which adds variability to the game board.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoardManager

      public GameBoardManager(Main mainInstance)
      Constructs a new GameBoardManager with a reference to the Main instance. Initializes a Random instance for use in block type determination and layout generation.
      Parameters:
      mainInstance - The Main instance of the game which holds the game state and shared resources.

  • Method Details

    • setupGameBoard

      public void setupGameBoard()
      Sets up the game board layout based on the current level. Clears existing blocks and generates a new layout according to the level. Different levels have unique designs such as space ships, patterns, and other shapes.
